alert.note: Alert for Charlevoix (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 2:51PM EST until December 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the ongoing Winter Weather Advisory, lake effect snow continues with additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Charlevoix County. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 PM EST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 4 AM Sunday to 1 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and pockets of significantly reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
